channel.title: GodzRSPS 667 [Looking for a GFX designer, server developer and forum developer]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://oi58.tinypic.com/2elr3bc.jpg[/img] [B] WHERE NOOBS BECOME LEGENDS![/B] [SIZE=7] Quick Link Menu[/SIZE] Website: [URL=http://"Godzrsps.co.uk"]Godzrsps.co.uk[/URL] Forums: [URL=http://"Godzrsps.co.uk/community"]Godzrsps.co.uk/community[/URL]
===========================
[B]What would Server developer be working with?[/B] You will be working with fixing dupes, adding basic suggestions and yeah so on
[B]What exactly would the Server developer needs to do?:[/B] Well, they need to fix bugs/dupes or some shizzle like some basic suggestions add stuff and so on.
[B]What will the graphic designer do?:[/B] Well, he's going to make design for us, and also lead the graphic section on forums.
[B]What will the Forum developer do?:[/B] Well, they are going to install hooks, fix bugs and basic forum stuff and also clean forums.
^ Need to have experience with IPB and stuff (Will test you)
===============================
[B]Fill in this application[/B]
Name?: Age?: Country? Timezone? Hours available per day: Skype (Pm me it) What job do you want to apply for (server developer, graphic designer or forum developer)?: Why do you want to join the development team?: (leave this blank, if you are not gonna join development team) Show your graphic design(Leave this blank, if you aren't going to apply for graphic designer) What you good at?: Anything else you would like to add?: //////////////////////////////////////////////
[B]Server Developer roster (2/3) Taken Taken Still opened[/B]
[B]Forum Developer roster (1/2) Taken Still opened
[B]Server graphic designer (0/3) Still opened Still opened Still opened
IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS PLEASE PM ME! ;) ==============================================[/CENTER]

item.title: GodzRSPS 667 [Looking for a GFX designer, server developer and forum developer]
item.dc:creator: @DivineX DivineX
item.description:

===========================

[B]What would Server developer be working with?[/B]
You will be working with fixing dupes, adding basic suggestions and yeah so on

[B]What exactly would the Server developer needs to do?:[/B]
Well, they need to fix bugs/dupes or some shizzle like some basic suggestions add stuff and so on.

[B]What will the graphic designer do?:[/B]
Well, he’s going to make design for us, and also lead the graphic section on forums.

[B]What will the Forum developer do?:[/B]
Well, they are going to install hooks, fix bugs and basic forum stuff and also clean forums.

^ Need to have experience with IPB and stuff (Will test you)

===============================

Show your graphic design(Leave this blank, if you aren’t going to apply for graphic designer)
